name: bge-en
description: This application enables you to use the BGE embeddings models available on Databricks. In order to use these models, it is necessary to have a Databricks serving endpoint and add a Databricks Token as a secret. For more information, consult the README files in the dataloop-ai-apps repo.

models.name: bge-small-en
models.description: BGE-Small-EN is a lightweight English text embedding model by BAAI, designed for high-quality embeddings in resource-limited environments. In order to use this model, it is necessary to have a Databricks serving endpoint and add a Databricks Token as a secret. For more information, consult the README files in the dataloop-ai-apps repo.
